attributes.action: exert pressure upon Willie Walsh to forego a pro rata amount of salary relative to the effect of losing one month of salary that the lowest paid employee of BA will endure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where one month's salary is GBP61,000.00 losing one month is nothing compared to an employee who loses one month out of an annual salary of eighteen or nineteen thousand pounds.  To have probity in this deal Mr Walsh should forego FIVE YEARS of salary.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
